Installs PERFECTLY in Windows Vista.

1. Install -- run Setup.exe

2. Patch -- run JDAFDeluxe_Patch_v130.exe
	NOTE:  Copy and paste the Patch file into the John Deere program folder directory.

3. Replace -- JohnDeereDeluxe.exe in the program files directory.

Nice Game! Thanx for sharing!

For all the persons who have problems with the D3dx9_29.dll file.

I did the next thing.
1.Unpack
2. run setup.exe
3. run patch
4. replace .exe file

Now download the newest version of diectx (version 11) after installing the game works.

So, the game install's directx 9, but you need to update.

Good luck
works fine, smooth and easy installation. Thanks
